meanings.definition: A unit of catalytic activity equal to 1 mole of a substrate transformed per second.
meanings.sent1: The scientist measured the katal of the enzyme reaction.
meanings.sent2: Enzymes are often rated in terms of their katal.
meanings.sent3: The katal of the enzyme was so high, it seemed like magic.
meanings.sent4: Her efficiency in the lab was like a katal, transforming everything swiftly.
meanings.sent5: The katal of the catalyst made the reaction lightning-fast.
